title: SSPAI Morning Brief: Samsung Unveils Galaxy Z TriFold, Sony Releases Alpha 7 V, and More
description: Morning Brief Samsung Releases Galaxy Z TriFold On December 2, Samsung officially unveiled its first tri-fold smartphone, the Galaxy Z TriFold. The device uses an inward-folding design, with both sides folding toward each other to protect the main display. To…
content:
